message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on a unique item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand that $75 is a good offer, but I was really hoping to get a bit more for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $82.50. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I'm not sure I can meet you at $82.50, but I'm willing to go up to $80. Can you consider that?

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob! I can see that we're really close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $81.50. It's a small compromise, but I think it's worth it to get this deal done.
I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back and forth, but I'm still interested in the product. I can go up to $79.50. Can you meet me there?

I understand that we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway between $79.50 and my previous offer. I'll sell the product to you for $80.75. It's a fair compromise, and I think we can make a deal.
I'm not sure I want to go above $80, so I'll try one more time. Can you sell it to me for $80?
